item.title: I Can’t Escape Myself
item.description: [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/gehenna.md#tethered-to-a-scene-i-treasure-can-you-help-me-vyl-wnanory|So many feelings]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/gehenna.md#tethered-to-a-scene-i-treasure-can-you-help-me-vyl-wnanory|Pent up in here]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/gehenna.md#tethered-to-a-scene-i-treasure-can-you-help-me-vyl-wnanory|Left all alone, I’m with]] [[songs/s/slipknot/all_hope_is_gone/gehenna.md#tethered-to-a-scene-i-treasure-can-you-help-me-vyl-wnanory|The one I most fear]] [[songs/o/opeth/damnation/to_rid_the_disease.md#theres-innocence-torn-from-its-maker-vyl-wnanory|I’m sick and I’m tired]] [[songs/o/opeth/damnation/to_rid_the_disease.
